name: FTP and FileSystem Synchronizer
short_description:
FTP and FileSystem Synchronizer (FTPCopy.exe)  is an easy Windows command line tool for synchronizing a remote FTP directory with a local directory.

It works either in upload mode in order to put an entire local directory to a FTP server directory, or in download mode in order to get an entire FTP server directory to a local directory.

FTPCopy can scan also subdirectory on both mode. 

FTPCopy detects file change (date/time or file size) for uploading or downloading a file.

FTPCopy can filter target or source files.

See Command line parameter at wiki page : http://sourceforge.net/p/ftpandfilesystemsynchronizer/wiki/Home/
summary: Synchronize FTP remote directory with a local directory
